attributes.action: Encourage employers to promote Blood Donors in the Workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With only a limited number of persons donating blood to the transfusion service (about 5% in Scotland alone).I would urge the Prime Minister to encourage employers to promote Blood Donors in the Workplace by giving a "credit" to workers who go to Blood Donor sessions.Just as they allow staff to go to a hospital or doctor's appointments.The PM could start with Public Bodies such as the Civil Service.
